name: Figma
description: Interact with Figma files, projects, teams, and components.

permissions.name: Read Files
permissions.description: Read Figma files content, nodes, components, styles.

permissions.name: Write Variables
permissions.description: Write or modify variables within Figma files.

permissions.name: Read Library Analytics
permissions.description: Read usage analytics for component libraries.

operations.name: Get Authenticated User
operations.description: Returns the user information authenticated by the access token.

operations.name: Get Team Styles
operations.description: Retrieves all published styles for a given team.

operations.name: Get File Nodes
operations.description: Retrieves details for one or more specific nodes within a Figma file.

parameters.name: ids
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of node IDs to retrieve.

operations.name: Get File
operations.description: Retrieves the complete document structure and content of a Figma file.

operations.name: Get Image Renders
operations.description: Renders images for one or more nodes in a Figma file.

parameters.name: ids
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of node IDs to render.

operations.name: Get Team Components
operations.description: Retrieves all published components for a given team.

operations.name: Get Team Component Sets
operations.description: Retrieves all published component sets for a given team.

operations.name: Get File Component Sets
operations.description: Retrieves all component sets defined within a specific Figma file.

operations.name: Get File Styles
operations.description: Retrieves all styles defined within a specific Figma file.

operations.name: Get File Components
operations.description: Retrieves all components defined within a specific Figma file.
